summary: Increases the size of the Azura Shrine so that its visible from all around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/rlkktv.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b][size=4][color=#ffff00][url=http://www.goodfellowmodshop.yolasite.com][b]My ModShop[/b][/url][/color][i][url=http://www.goodfellowmodshop.yolasite.com]
[/url][/i][/size][/b][/size]
After taking inspiration from Bioshock Infinite, i noticed that the shrine of Azura was visible from miles around as it stood on the top of a mountain. Now even more citizens of Skyrim can enjoy the view as i have greatly increased the size of the statue, this adds a great new landmark to the area and is a great guiding beacon to those lost in a snowstorm on the way to Winterhold!

This will also fix any statue LOD issues with the vanilla version of Skyrim, obviously the whole statue will be a lot larger.
author: Goodfellowgoodpsring
